aboleth.json.name: Aboleth
aboleth.json.description: Spoken by Aboleth and other deep sea aberrations

abyssal.json.name: Abyssal
abyssal.json.description: The language of demons, Abyssal is often spoken by evil spirits.

aklo.json.name: Aklo
aklo.json.description: This ancient tongue is spoken by strange eldritch entities, and certain ancient beings (Derro, otherworldy monsters, evil fey)

aquan.json.name: Aquan
aquan.json.description: The so-called “tongue of the sea” is spoken primarily in the sunken nation of the locathahs— those who trade frequently with the ocean empires often speak this tongue as well.

auran.json.name: Auran
auran.json.description: A soft-spoken, breathy language, also known as the “tongue of the heavens.”

celestial.json.name: Celestial
celestial.json.description: The language of angels and other good outsiders.

common.json.name: Common
common.json.description: Spoken by humans and most other core races (elf, dwarf, etc..)

cyclops.json.name: Cyclops
cyclops.json.description: Once the ancient language of the giants, this tongue was created by the cyclops before the rise of humanity.

dark_folk.json.name: Dark Folk
dark_folk.json.description: Spoken by all the various kinds of dark folk

draconic.json.name: Draconic
draconic.json.description: Primary language of dragons, this is also spoken by various other reptilian humanoids

drow_sign_language.json.name: Drow Sign Language
drow_sign_language.json.description: [Unspoken] A secret sign language created and shared only among the drow race

druidic.json.name: Druidic
druidic.json.description: A secret language only known to Druids. This has it own alphabet and is forbidden to be taught to non-Druids.

dwarven.json.name: Dwarven
dwarven.json.description: A common language created by the dwarves

dziriak.json.name: D’ziriak
dziriak.json.description: The insectoid d’ziriak language consists of buzzes and chitters. It is an obscure one known by few outside their race.

elven.json.name: Elven
elven.json.description: A common language typically spoken by elves and half-elves

giant.json.name: Giant
giant.json.description: This brutish tongue and its numerous minor variants are spoken in any region where the wrath of giants is known.

gnome.json.name: Gnome
gnome.json.description: A common language typically spoken by Gnomes

goblin.json.name: Goblin
goblin.json.description: The official language of hobgoblins, this is also used by goblins and bugbears

ignan.json.name: Ignan
ignan.json.description: Called the "Tongue of Fire" due to being used by fire-based creatures from the elemental planes.

infernal.json.name: Infernal
infernal.json.description: The language of devils, this is often used by evil spirits or lawful-evil outsiders.

necril.json.name: Necril
necril.json.description: An ancient language of the dead, this whispering tongue is shared among undead and is often associated with necromancy.

orc.json.name: Orc
orc.json.description: A common language created and used by Orcs

protean.json.name: Protean
protean.json.description: Like the Proteans chaotic nature, this language is mutable, evolving so quickly that few outsiders can understand it without magical aid.

sphinx.json.name: Sphinx
sphinx.json.description: An uncommon language typically only spoken by Sphinxes

sylvan.json.name: Sylvan
sylvan.json.description: The language of the Fey, this language is also spoken by Centaurs, Unicorns, and plant-based creatures

tengu.json.name: Tengu
tengu.json.description: The official language of the Tengu race.

terran.json.name: Terran
terran.json.description: Called the "Tongue of Earth" due to being used by earth-based creatures from the elemental planes.

treant.json.name: Treant
treant.json.description: An uncommon language typically only spoken by Treants

undercommon.json.name: Undercommon
undercommon.json.description: The language of the underdark, this is derived from an ancient combination of Elven and even older tongues. Typically used by Drow, Duergar, Morlocks, Svirfneblin, and other creatures of the underworld.

vegepygmy.json.name: Vegepygmy
vegepygmy.json.description: [Unspoken] This is a crude language of rhythmic taps, beats, and clicks created by the vegepygmies (who cannot speak).
